Project.Brief history of your project and organi: our company has dedicated itself to crafting and distributing top-tier short video content designed for entertainment, covering a broad spectrum of themes such as adventure, fitness, daily living, and imaginative narratives. Our goal is to captivate a global audience with visually stunning and engaging clips, using advanced tools and platforms to make these videos easily accessible and enjoyable. This DataCap proposal seeks to archive our diverse collection of entertaining short videos on the Filecoin network, guaranteeing their safety, reliability, and enduring accessibility for viewers across the globe.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset features a rich variety of recreational video content, encompassing areas such as entertainment, exploration, athletic activities, and everyday living. The videos are presented in high-definition quality, meticulously compressed and processed to ensure smooth streaming and efficient downloading. By hosting this data on the Filecoin network, we guarantee its resilience against data loss, fortified protection against unauthorized access, and effortless availability for a global audience, anytime and anywhere.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data will undergo local processing, including compression, conversion, and standardization, utilizing tools such as FFmpeg to ensure all videos meet the necessary requirements for storage and transmission. Following this, the graphsplit program will be employed to generate a .car file that adheres to the specified standards. Finally, the venus tool will be used to package the data, ensuring it is optimized for secure and efficient storage on the Filecoin network.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, Europe, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Venus built-in data transfer, Shipping hard drives, HTTP or FTP server
